get.description:
there can be multiple search parameters, id or translit, or both
example: ?id=1&id=2&translit=author-21&id=3&translit=author-756342

parameters.description: Author Id, must be a primitive id hex
parameters.name: id

400.description: Field was not in a correct format

get.description: find authors by provided phares, keys or names

parameters.description: limit authors to display. default = 5 if not specified, min = 1, max = 10
parameters.name: limit

get.description: find books by provided phares, keys or names

parameters.description: limit books to display. default = 5 if not specified, min = 1, max = 10
parameters.name: limit

get.description:
Searches category or genre based on id or translit name
Query can be: category id, category translit name, genre id or genre translit name
If category found, it returns whole category with nested genre. Otherwise it returns a single genre

parameters.description: query to find. can be hex id or translit name
parameters.name: query

200.description: Response body. Only one field will be presented

get.description:
Searches category tree based on category or genre id or translate name
Query can be: category id, category translit name, genre id or genre translit name
If genre id or name matches, it returns whole category that contains that genre

parameters.description: query to find. can be hex id or translit name
parameters.name: query

get.description:
params goes in specific order: id -> login -> email
first found user will be returned. If no user found, there'll be an error with details

400.description: Request's field was not in a correct format

get.description: check if current user has legit token

404.description: User does not exists in database

post.description: log in user with provided login and password

parameters.description: Login field can be presented as login and email as well
parameters.name: request

post.description: Removes user session if one exists
creates new user and authorizes it

middleware.CustomError.description: General error object. This structure always returns when error occurred

details.description: Error details. Check 'ErrorDetail' structure for more information

message.description: Error message. Can be shown to users

shared_pb.ErrorDetail.description: Error detail contains information about error

actualvalue.description: Actual value of field that causes the error. Note: 'password' field will be hidden

description.description: Error description. Only development purposes, do not show users
description.example: Field must be a jwt token

login.description: Can be presented as login or email
